name: Thorned Sulfurlord
description: The Thorned Sulfurlord is a massive fiend adorned with thorny protrusions and an aura of chaos, embodying malevolence and destruction.
memorable: Its ability to create difficult terrain and deal continuous fire damage while being immune to fire and poison makes it a unique menace.
goals: To sow chaos and destruction while identifying and punishing those who are evil.
relations: May serve or ally with other evil creatures, especially those that share a chaotic disposition.
environment: Typically found in chaotic and infernal realms, often in areas of fire and destruction.
strengths: High hit points and defensive capabilities, along with abilities that manipulate the battlefield and deal consistent damage.
attacks: The Sulfur Slam strikes with bludgeoning damage and can blind foes, while the Fiery Spike offers a ranged attack that includes piercing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: The World Shall Know Fire unleashes a devastating fire explosion targeting foes previously damaged by fire, creating a large area of effect.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 120 feet, enabling it to see through illusions and recognize hidden threats.
skills: Has proficiency in athletics and perception, making it adept at grappling and sensing nearby creatures.
additional_information: Creates difficult terrain around itself, hindering enemy movement.
Immunities include fire and poison damage, and it cannot be charmed or poisoned.
Can detect evil-aligned creatures within 100 feet.
Root ability enhances its durability at the cost of mobility for a limited time.
Capable of telepathic communication within 120 feet.
test_queries: chaotic being with fire damage attacks
